column1: $Ghoti of the Deep Beyond$Unlimited(TCGAdvancedandTraditional)$WATER$[Fish/Synchro/Effect]$$$$$10$?$0$$1+ Fish Tuners + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$$The original ATK of this card becomes 500 x the number of banished monsters. If this card is Synchro Summoned during your opponent's turn: You can banish all cards on the field. During the Standby Phase of the next turn after this card was banished from the Monster Zone: You can Special Summon this banished card.$Fish$$$$
